Package group2.monopoly.auth.service

Class UserPasswordResetService

java.lang.Object
group2.monopoly.auth.service.UserPasswordResetService
@Service public class UserPasswordResetService extends Object
Service providing password reset features including token generation.

  • Method Details

    • generateNewToken

      public UserPasswordReset generateNewToken(@NonNull @NonNull User user, Date validUntil, UUID uuid)
      Creates a new password reset token and invalidates old one.
      The newly generated token is sent to the user's registered email address.
      Parameters:
      user - The account object
      validUntil - Time until when the token is valid
      uuid - Password reset token value
      Returns:
      Password reset token object

    • generateNewToken

      public UserPasswordReset generateNewToken(@NonNull @NonNull User user)
      Creates a new password reset token and invalidates old one given a User.
      A random UUID is while generating the token, and the token is valid for two days.
      Parameters:
      user - The account object
      Returns:
      Generated password reset token if such account exists
      See Also:
      • generateNewToken(User, Date, UUID)

    • generateNewToken

      public Optional<UserPasswordReset> generateNewToken(@NonNull @NotBlank @NonNull @NotBlank String identifier)
      Creates a new password reset token and invalidates old one given an account identifier.
      A random UUID is while generating the token, and the token is valid for two days.
      Parameters:
      identifier - Email or username of an account
      Returns:
      Generated password reset token if such account exists
      See Also:
      • generateNewToken(User, Date, UUID)

    • resetPassword

      public Optional<User> resetPassword(@NonNull @NonNull UUID token, String newPassword)
      Resets the password of the account corresponding to the given token.
      Password reset commences only if the supplied token exists, corresponds to a user, and it is not past its expiration date. Reset token is invalidated during the process.
      Parameters:
      token - UUID token
      newPassword - new password
      Returns:
      User object if the supplied token was valid
